DOC.brief_summary: This study do see Nova Creatinine Meter give correct measure creatinine ( blood test use measure kidney function ) blood take capillary ( small type blood vessel ) . Since chemotherapy patient need creatinine measure prior treatment , meter could make test easy faster .
